description: Ms. codex. Title from fol. 1a. Physical description: 25 lines per page; written in naskhi script in black on modern glossy brown paper. Rubrication and catchwords. Some insect damage, but text unaffected. Origin: Completed 29 Dhū al-Qaʻdah 1305 AH (7 August 1888) (fol. 100b).
author: Abū al-Hudá al-Ṣayyādī, Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan Wādī, 1849 or 1850-1910 or 1911
abstract: An extensive work on Sufism, followed by a poem on fol. 101a. Likely unique.
extent: 101 leaves : paper ; 233 x 155 (180 x 94) mm. bound to 233 x 156 mm.
title: Ghunyat al-ṭālibīn fī īḍāḥ ṭarīq al-mashāyikh al-ʻārifīn
creator: ابو الهدى الصيادي، محمد بن حسن وادي.
subject: Sufism
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
